Question: Who was the main character in *Son of Chucky* as a result of the events in *Bride of Chucky*?
Options:
A. Chucky
B. Son of Chucky
C. Glen or Glenda
D. Don Mancini

Question: Which horror villains were mentioned to have become less scary as they became more familiar with audiences in the movie *Son of Chucky*?
Options:
A. Chucky
B. Son of Chucky
C. Michael Myers, Jason Voorhees, and Freddy Krueger
D. Don Mancini
Answer: Michael Myers, Jason Voorhees, and Freddy Krueger
